description:
Phenix was taking a mid-day nap last week when a 'burglar' snuck into the room and grabbed his watch which was sitting on the nightstand. Phenix, being the light sleeper that he is, heard the noise and grabbed the hand of the intruder. It happened to be Brodie, and he had an offer for Phenix, suck his cock or he's keeping the watch.

Phenix didn't want any trouble, and he was pretty horny, so he agreed to give his buddy a blowjob.

Not only do you get to see Brodie getting serviced, you get to enjoy Phenix trying without success to get Brodie's thick cock into his ass.

This scene's hot with plenty of naughty action.

Have fun!
title: Brodie & Phenix Saint
